body.name: SAMSUNG 32" Odyssey G65B QHD 240Hz 1ms (GTG) HDR 600 Gaming Hub 1000R Curved Gaming Monitor,Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 7 mins
FREE delivery February 15 - 16. Order within 15 hrs 7 mins.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Reducing CO2 products reduce their carbon footprint year after year. Certified by the Carbon Trust.

features: QHD RESOLUTION: Your gaming world will be more life like than ever before. Packing in 1.7 times the pixel density of Full HD, QHD resolution boasts incrediblydetailed, pin-sharp images. Experience a fuller view with more space to take in all the action..Operating Temperature : 10-40 degree Celsius.

DISPLAY HDR 600: Reveal the whole picture. DisplayHDR 600 delivers more contrast, with deeper blacks and brighter whites to help you uncover enemies orsecrets lurking in the shadows. Even in dark scenes, every detail shines with clarity.

240Hz REFRESH RATE & 1MS RESPONSE TIME: Speed through scenes. 240Hz refresh rate eliminates lag for exhilarating gameplay withultra-smooth action. Jump on enemies right when you see them with a 1ms response time and blur-free frames.

AMD FREESYNC PREMIUM PRO: Effortlessly smooth game play. AMD FreeSync Premium Pro features adaptive sync technology which reduces screen tearing, stutter, and inputlatency. Low frame rate compensation ensures every scene flows seamlessly.

1000R CURVE: Vivid scenes wrap even more tightly around you. Experience the next level of heart-pounding gaming that's superior to anything you've seenbefore. The 1000R display fills your peripheral vision and draws you into the character's shoes.
body.description: Dive into a new visual experience with the Samsung Odyssey G65B Curved Gaming Monitor. QHD resolution with DisplayHDR 600 brings forth spectacular colors and detail, while a 240Hz refresh rate, 1ms response time and AMD FreeSync Premium Pro ensure a true-to-life gaming experience. The Samsung G65B lets you dive into a world of content too, with advanced streaming technology that offers smooth play and zero download or storage limits. You can instantly access top streaming services and console games via Gaming Hub, and enjoy free live content with Samsung TV Plus in stunning QHD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Gaming Monitor at an Affordable Price
reviews.reviewText: Solid Monitor with a high quality image with strong blacks on a VA panel, fantastic 240hz refresh rate, quick response time. Comes with some extra built in UI features and a remote for TV like functions or cloud gaming, which I don't really need, seeing as I am using this exclusively as a PC monitor. But certainly not a downside. Wasn't perfect out of the box, but with a little calibration and optimizing, gaming at 240 FPS looks and feels great. Perfect alongside my old 1440p 144hz monitor as a second monitor, and my new PC. Able to hit those 1440p/240FPS marks with my 7950X3D and 7900XTX GPU.Would recommend at it's current sale price just under $500. If your looking to spend more, consider an OLED option in the $800-1000 range for a screen with comparable specs. Also has Freesync Premium Pro with an effecting range from 60-240FPS for system/titles that are unable to hit that 240hz refresh rate at all times. From my testing this seems most optimal from 120-240 FPS, 60-120 FPS seems a bit less effective. Either way great monitor for the money spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy moly what a monitor
reviews.reviewText: I almost got the G7 but it never arrived so I got this one instead and I'm SO GLAD I DID. The curve is super immersive, it's absolutely magical for gaming (240hz baby!), and it has all the bells and whistles. It's made for Freesync (sorry Gsync bros), has fancy RGB to up your frames, and a solid stand. Assembly was super easy. ALSO, there's a remote and you have Samgsung TV channels and easily link to your streaming stuff. Superb!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This monitor was a great buy especially for 200$ off. The resolution is amazing but, after upgrading from 1920x1080 to 2560x1440 it’s something to get use too. Great purchase 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This monitor is amazing
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t feel like you’re looking at a monitor. Feels like you’re looking at a high-end magazine where the pictures can somehow move.Huge amount of screen real estate. And helps so much with eye strain. The 1000R curvature (the only radius that matches our eyes’ natural optics at a meter), the HDR 600 contrast capability, and the extreme refresh rate all help with that.No, I wasn’t paid a nickel for this review. I’m just happy to have my eyes back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Screen quality is awful for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Totally worth it
reviews.reviewText: I got my G6 on prime day deal for 449 although I was using Lg 32 ultragear 2k 165hz. I didn’t expect much about it, but when I setup, I have to acknowledge this Monitor is way better than Lg which cost me more than 600. 240 Hz refresh rate with curved Samsung screen only need 90 a month, what can I ask for more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor colors, yellow tint, scanlines, flickering
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a samsung odyssey twice (for some stupid reason) and both times it was a bad experience. The picture quality is poor and extremely dim when using HDR. The colors have a yellowish tint and are inaccurate and make the screen look dirty. Then you have the scanlines. They are everywhere. There is no perfectly rounded edges on this monitor, they will all look pixelated because you can see the scanlines. Long story short I am never buying a samsung again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Personally love it
reviews.reviewText: Its a hassle to really fine tune. But I enjoy it alot
